title: Gldani Lake
about: Gldani Big Lake (Big Lake, White Lake) is a lake in the northern part of Tbilisi, on the left bank of the Mtkvari River, near the village of Gldani. Located at altitude 546 m above sea level. The surface area is 0.2 km, the basin area is 0.77 km. The lake is about 900 m long and 300 m wide. The lake is fed mainly by rain and snow water as well as bitter salt springs, which is why it is saline.
